name: Magic Madness
description:
Game Created for GMTK 2020 Game Jam

Theme: Out of control

Mouse or Space to shoot

AWSD or Arrow Keys to move

Random Levels

Magician that loses control of his wand.

No time to finish:

  • Shop to spend gold
  • HighScore
  • Score per time
  • Improve Graphics
  • Better Twister Power (Wanted to be more random path)
